text: - Initially, we employed
our own data centers like many companies,

and we were looking to scale
out in a global fashion

with many different solutions
that we comprises as suites

and to deliver specific
needs for customers.

As we looked at the options
of trying to do this ourselves

versus trying to do it
with a cloud provider,
it just seemed to make a lot more sense
to do it with the cloud provider.
We've built a suite of solutions

that meet the specific
needs of our customers

and doing it on the AWS
platform allowed us to do it

much more quickly than
we could've ourselves.

The customers are getting
much more rapid time to value.
We're able to deliver a very reliable
and performant solution.

We're able to deliver
it in a global fashion.

We're currently deployed
in over 12 regions.
From an employee perspective,
it's been a fantastic relationship.

Our employees have been able
to really get their hands

into the leading cloud
technologies that AWS is creating

and we've continued to
evolve as AWS evolves.
(upbeat music)
